Getting Started
===============

This section will guide you through the basics of getting started with documentation projects.

Tutorial
--------

A step-by-step tutorial to create your first documentation project:

1. Install the required tools
2. Initialize your documentation project
3. Write your first pages
4. Build and test your documentation
5. Deploy to your preferred platform

Adding a documentation project
------------------------------

To add a new documentation project:

.. code-block:: bash

   # Initialize a new project
   docs-init my-project
   
   # Navigate to project directory
   cd my-project
   
   # Build the documentation
   docs-build

Popular documentation tools
---------------------------

- **Sphinx**: Python documentation generator
- **MkDocs**: Markdown-based documentation tool
- **Docusaurus**: React-based documentation framework
- **GitBook**: Modern documentation platform
- **Read the Docs**: Documentation hosting platform
